section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Jundab b. 'Abdullah reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:He who prayed the morning prayer (in congregation) he is in fact under the protection of Allah. And it can never happen that Allah should demand anything from you in connection with the protection (that He guarantees) and one should not get it. He would then throw him in the fire of Hell
